      • onPlayerChangePosition

        public void onPlayerChangePosition(net.risingworld.api.events.player.PlayerChangePositionEvent event)
        Called when the player changes of world position. Note: change of view direction without any actual displacement does not always trigger this event, particularly while flying.
        Parameters:
        event - the change-position event

        Returns the version for this plug-in (conforms to the PluginCentral 2 interface).
        Returns:
        the plug-in version as an int.

      • setGPSShow

        public void setGPSShow(net.risingworld.api.objects.Player player,
                       boolean show)
        Turns on/off the GPS display.
        Parameters:
        player - the player for whom to toggle the GSP display
        show - true to show | false to hide

      • setShowHome

        public void setShowHome(net.risingworld.api.objects.Player player)
        Toggles on/off the display of home way-point data
        Parameters:
        player - the player for whom to change the home display

      • setShowWp

        public void setShowWp(net.risingworld.api.objects.Player player,
                      java.lang.Integer index)
        Controls the display of way-point data.
        Parameters:
        player - the affected player.
        index - an integer from 1 to 15 to display the corresponding way-point or -1 to display next target point or 0 to turn way-point display off

      • addTarget

        public void addTarget(net.risingworld.api.objects.Player player,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      float x,
                      float y,
                      float z)
        Adds the given point to the list of targets for player 'player'
        Parameters:
        player - the player to whom add the target
        x - the target x coordinate
        y - the target y coordinate
        z - the target z coordinate
        name - a human readable name for the target

      • teleportToWp

        public void teleportToWp(net.risingworld.api.objects.Player player,
                         java.lang.Integer index)
        Tele-transports to the index-th way-point. The way-point must be defined and, if different from Home, teleport to way-points must be enabled.
        Parameters:
        player - the affected player.
        index - a int from 0 to 9 with the index of the way-point.
